name: Flee, little guinea pig!
description:
Mini golf x Stealth/Infiltration game!

You're a guinea pig who is trying to run away from a laboratory.

This LD theme was the perfect timing to try this old idea of mine. I'll probably make a post jam version because I had a lot of idea I didn't have the time to implement :(.
Anyway, I hope you'll like this proof of concept.

Don't hesitate to share your final highscore in the comments!
